text: @DrBill_MD_ It seems certain parties have a vested interest in the Bill Gates/ID2020/digital vaccine path. The control gained by forcing “Immunity passports” is far more appealing that actually delivering an effective treatment at this stage. https://t.co/ZWpZ9y0RoJ
